name: Compass 70 / Building #4
description: Kadean Construction has been shortlisted as a General Contractor bidder for Compass 70 Building #4, a 248,400 square foot rear-load industrial distribution speculative warehouse. This project consists of site work and utilities, site improvements and pavements, concrete foundations, slabs and concrete tilt-up walls with conventional steel joist and deck framing, TPO roofing and associated architectural finishes. Kadean has completed all mass grading and vertical construction currently completed within this park.
